turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey James, I'm thirsty. Could you order a drink from Starbucks for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Do you know where is the closest Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. There's one down the street on 1933 Howard Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh yeah, I'm familiar with that one. What do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you pickup a Nitro Lemon Fog?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets order a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay will do. Is there anything specific you'd like to add.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. See if they can add a some honey and a splash of milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure you'd want to add milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually you're right. Milk in this drink might be gross. Lets stick to the honey only.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is there anything else you'd like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! So to confirm, you would like a Grande, Nitro Lemon Fog with Honey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome. Your order is placed and should be picked up in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. It was sent to you phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay got it. Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
